resources.string: Could not check whether you have subscribed to the channel (id=%s)

Deselect everything on https://takeout.google.com except \"YouTube and YouTube Music\" and click \"All YouTube data included\" to only get subscriptions. Click \"Next\" and then \"Create export\". Click to receive an e-mail with a download link. Download the file from your e-mail client and extract it. Import subscriptions.json (in /Takeout/YouTube and YouTube Music/subscriptions/) from it in SkyTube using \"Select Subscription File\" below.
Unsubscribe from all your currently subscribed channels.
Could not find any YouTube channels in the file you uploaded.
No YouTube channels you are not already subscribed to were found.
Could not parse the file you uploaded: %s.
Could not import your YouTube subscriptions.
